title: Halloween Watch Face
summary: Halloween Watch Face for Android Wear
description: Halloween Watch Face for Android Wear with animated eyes.Tested with LG G Watch R, LG Watch and MOTO 360.
descriptionHTML:
Halloween Watch Face for Android Wear with animated eyes.

Tested with LG G Watch R, LG Watch and MOTO 360.
comments: Really nice watch face for Halloween. I like the blinking eyes :-)
Very cool. Amazing that it doesn't chew up the battery like most other animated watch faces do. Awesome!
Please add the. Date and day of week
My go to Halloween watch face
Works great on Moto 360 2nd edition. Thanks to the developer.
Just enough spoopy Doesn't overdo the spoopy
